attributes.action: Introduce Financial Incentive State Schools with a new method of Teaching
attributes.additional_details:
Introduce state schools which reward the good pupils

. £10/£20 per week depending on the grade and effort of the pupil (Based on the American system)

. In order to analyse the progress of each pupil make them sit a compulsory practise exam paper per week or introduce a structured online progress system (such as the Khan Academy website)

. Allow the pupils to sit their exams when THEY feel ready. This will stop the stupid two/three weeks of cramming in all their exams and encourage self study in order to progress in life quicker. If they fail give them a chance to have one free re-sit.

. STOP making school compulsory, this will put more responsibility on the shoulders of young people and make them realise that education is a priviledge. If they miss school and get low grades (below C) at the end of the month they risk being expelled from the school. This will also kick out the bullies.
